name: Black Diamond Solution Harness - Men's
description: Quick gym sessions or multi-pitch epics, this ergonomically designed harness sets you up with comfort and performance. Generous EVA foam provides cushy comfort while hangdogging or belaying, while the mesh lining keeps overheating and moisture at bay. Flexible design means it won’t get in the way while high-stepping or heel-hooking. 4 stiff gear loops keep draws and your rack in position for fast, fumble-free access.Triple-weave webbing moves with your body during technical, demanding moves.EVA foam with padded mesh lining reduces is cushy, breathable and without pressure points.Self-locking speed buckle and non-adjustable leg loops make for fast-changes.4 stiff gear loops.
